Menu - Class in it.kibo.fp.lib
The Menu class creates a menu with multiple entry supposing that zero is always the exit option.
Menu(String, String[], boolean, boolean, boolean) - Constructor for class it.kibo.fp.lib.Menu
Constructor that creates a Menu object specifying a title, the entries of the menu, if you want the exit entry or not, if you want the title centred and if you also want the vertical frame in the title.
